full_text: Page 1888 Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update From Shirley V. Skipper-Scott To [redacted] Date 2019/07/28 09:01 Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update Attachments: TEXT.htm Great. Thanks. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From [redacted] @bop.gov Date: 7/28/19 8:58 AM (GMT-05:00) To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update >> [redacted] 07/28/2019 08:58 >>> Thanks! I'll let the Lt.s' know to move him. >>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [redacted] @bop.gov> 7/28/2019 8:56 AM >>> Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From [redacted] @bop.gov Date: 7/28/19 8:52 AM (GMT-05:00) To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update >> [redacted] 07/28/2019 08:52 >>> He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sandwich at about 4:15 PM. He said he should be getting lunch and dinner. Also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he found it so aversive and disorienting, he has been urinating in a cup. I already sent an e-mail to [redacted] about the toilet Page 10238 DOJ-OGR-00025872

text_blocks.content: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update From Shirley V. Skipper-Scott To [redacted] Date 2019/07/28 09:01 Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update Attachments: TEXT.htm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From [redacted] @bop.gov Date: 7/28/19 8:58 AM (GMT-05:00) To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>> [redacted] 07/28/2019 08:58 >>> Thanks! I'll let the Lt.s' know to move him.

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [redacted] @bop.gov> 7/28/2019 8:56 AM >>> Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this.

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From [redacted] @bop.gov Date: 7/28/19 8:52 AM (GMT-05:00) To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov> Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update

>> [redacted] 07/28/2019 08:52 >>> He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sandwich at about 4:15 PM. He said he should be getting lunch and dinner. Also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he found it so aversive and disorienting, he has been urinating in a cup. I already sent an e-mail to [redacted] about the toilet

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing a prisoner's status on suicide watch and psych observation. Multiple email addresses and names are redacted.
